parameters.name: MatchExpressions
parameters.description: The tag match conditions that are described in a JSON string. For more information about this parameter, see the **Additional description of the MatchExpressions parameter** section.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the alert rule.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the alert rule is enabled. Valid values:

- 1: enables the alert rule.
- 0: disables the alert rule.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the alert rule.
